code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL='/api/auth/';const register=(username,email,password)=>{return axios.post(API_URL+'register',{username,email,password});};const login=(username,password)=>{return axios.post(API_URL+'login',{username,password}).then(response=>{if(response.data.access_token){localStorage.setItem('user',JSON.stringify(response.data));}return response.data;});};const logout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('user');};const authService={register,login,logout};export default authService;
